籤詩版本二:
Ukuhaya izinkondlo ekushoneni kwelanga, ukucula izingoma ngaphansi kwenyanga, ukuncokola ngawo wonke amathuba
Lapho sihlangana, sizocasha enkingeni futhi sicule ndawonye ukuze sicule uLianliluo.U-Lianli ubhekisela esihlahleni esiqhubekayo. Lifanekisela ukuzwana phakathi kwendoda nomfazi. Luo Zhiwang. Kusho ukuthi umbhangqwana ubambene. Noma isilikhi ne-satin ibhekisela ezingutsheni ezimibalabala.
詩意:
Le hexagram iwuphawu lokugcina izinto ezindala futhi zishintsha noma nini.
Konke kuhle.
解曰: Ubuhle busendlini. Hlabelelani izinkondlo. Kwakukhona injabulo. Inhlanhla namashwa.
籤詩故事一:
◇USu Xiaomei usenkingeni
Ebukhosini beNgoma, u-Su Xiaomei wayengudadewabo omncane ka-Su Dongpo. Wayefundile futhi enekhono. Ngobusuku bomshado wabo, u-Su Xiaomei wahaya izinkondlo futhi wabhala ama-couplets. Kwalungiselelwa imibuzo emithathu enzima ukuze kuvivinywe umkhwenyana, futhi ngamabomu wenza izinto zaba nzima kumkhwenyana uQin Shaoyou. Lapho kuziwa embuzweni wesithathu, uQin Shaoyou wacabanga kanzima.
Ngenhlanhla, u-Su Dongpo wamsiza ngasese ngaphambi kokuthi angene ekamelweni lomakoti.
Kunenkondlo ethi:
Izihloko zathi kusukela ezikhathini zasendulo udade omncane uhlakaniphe kunomyeni wakhe;
Umkhwenyana we-Three Difficulties uyinqaba ngempela, indlu yobuhle obungenakuqhathaniswa emhlabeni.
聖意: Inhlanhla yekhaya, inhlanhla yebhizinisi, inhlanhla yomshado, inhlanhla kubantu besifazane, ukuhamba emasimini, ukuvuthwa kwemisundu, inhlanhla yemfuyo, ukufuna abantu, inhlanhla yokumangalela, inhlanhla ukufuduka, inhlanhla ngempahla elahlekile, inhlanhla ngokugula, inhlanhla yokugula, inhlanhla ngamathuna asezintabeni
